sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zuòle yīgè měihǎo de mèng.

sentences.simplifiedText: 虽然我们都知道那只是做梦，但我们仍然期待它能成真。
sentences.traditionalText: 雖然我們都知道那只是做夢，但我們仍然期待它能成真。
sentences.pinyin: Suīrán wǒmen dōu zhīdào nà zhǐshì zuò mèng, dàn wǒmen réngrán qídài tā néng chéng zhēn.
sentences.translation: Even though we all know it's just a dream, we still hope that it can come true.

sentences.simplifiedText: 别做梦了，我们没有机会赢。
sentences.traditionalText: 別做夢了，我們沒有機會贏。
sentences.pinyin: Bié zuò mèng le, wǒmen méiyǒu jīhuì yíng.
sentences.translation: Stop dreaming, we have no chance of winning.

sentences.simplifiedText: 你觉得有可能让那个坏心肠的人变好？你在做梦吧！
sentences.traditionalText: 你覺得有可能讓那個壞心腸的人變好？你在做夢吧！
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ juédé yǒu kěnéng ràng nà ge huàixīncháng de rén biànhǎo? Nǐ zài zuòmèng ba!
sentences.translation: You think it's possible to make that wicked person become good? You are dreaming!

sentences.simplifiedText: 他总是做梦想当一名歌手。
sentences.traditionalText: 他總是做夢想當一名歌手。
sentences.pinyin: tā zǒng shì zuò mèng xiǎng dāng yī míng gē shǒu.
sentences.translation: He always daydreams of becoming a singer.

sentences.simplifiedText: 虽然我知道做梦成为亿万富翁的想法不切实际，但我还是乐在其中。
sentences.traditionalText: 雖然我知道做夢成為億萬富翁的想法不切實際，但我還是樂在其中。
sentences.pinyin: suī rán wǒ zhī dào zuò mèng chéng wéi yì wàn fù wēng de xiǎng fǎ bù qiè shí jì, dàn wǒ hái shì lè zài qí zhōng.
sentences.translation: Although I know that dreaming of becoming a billionaire is unrealistic, I still enjoy it.
